ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.content: From the moment we met, we knew it was meant to be...

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.message: Please let us know if you will be attending our wedding by 15.07.2026. Please answer the RSVP for each guest separately so that we can get the guest list and allergies right.

location.title: Location
location.name: Nordre Skøyen Hovedgård
location.description: Both the ceremony and the reception will take place at Nordre Skøyen Hovedgård.
location.reasoning: We chose this venue for its cozy atmosphere and central location, making it easy to reach for everyone. A lush, green allé leads up to the venue, and the surroundings offer a beautiful view over the city, creating a calm and intimate setting close to the heart of Oslo.
location.directions: The venue is easy to reach, just 20 minutes from the city center by public transport.
location.parking: Parking is available at the venue for those who wish to drive.

practicalInfo.title: Practical Information
practicalInfo.accommodation: We have reserved a block of rooms at the Grand Hotel. Please mention our wedding when booking.
practicalInfo.transportation: Shuttle service will be provided from the city center to the venue and back.
practicalInfo.childFree: Our wedding will be an adults-only event.
practicalInfo.parking: Parking is available at the venue for those who wish to drive.
practicalInfo.wishingWell: Your presence is the greatest gift we could ask for. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, a contribution to our honeymoon fund would be greatly appreciated.

program.title: Program
program.doorsOpenSub: Snacks and aperitifs - Get to know the place & each other
program.arriveBefore: Please arrive before 14:45 to ensure you have enough time to find your seat and get settled before the ceremony begins.
program.ceremonySub: We say yes! The ceremony will be phone-free & our lovely photographer will capture the moments
program.cocktailHour: 16:00 - Photos with the couple & cocktail hour
program.cocktailHourSub: Enjoy some refreshment, mingle with other guests and take photos with us!
program.dinnerSub: Time to eat, drink and be merry! We will have a delicious 3-course meal accompanied by speeches.
program.cakeCuttingSub: Time for dessert and coffee! We will be moving into another room to cut the cake.
program.partySub: We will have our first dance and open the dance floor - let the party begin!
program.farewellSub: Doors closes and we hope you had a great time celebrating with us!
